Toggling between Chart Types

BusinessIQ has a standard set of charts that are compatible with different report definitions. The number of attributes and metrics in your report definition dictate the allowable charts; for example, BIQ will not let you create a scatter plot if you only have one metric in your report; you cannot create a histogram, pie chart or bubble chart with two metrics; stacked bar charts require at least two attributes, and so on.

Depending on the report definition, BIQ will default to a particular view that is compatible with the data when your report executes. Afterwards, you can toggle between the available chart types in the chart panel. Each time you click on a new chart type, the chart view will generate fresh. Depending on how much data you are bringing back, this can feel either instantaneous, or take several seconds to refresh.
